---
name: Proposal (write it up before a PR)
about: Discuss an idea before changing text
title: "Proposal: <short title>"
labels: proposal
assignees: ''
---

### What do you want to change?
(Quote the current wording and your proposed new wording.)

### Why?
(Explain benefits: sleep, fairness, clarity, etc.)

### Any open questions?
(List anything you want to discuss.)

### Would you like to make the PR yourself?
- [ ] Yes, please assign this to me
- [ ] No, feel free to draft the PR for me
